speaker: Narrative
dialog: MC and their Friend decided to have a picnic together in a meadow near their village. As they finish up their hangout time, the MC realizes they forgot something important.

speaker: Me
dialog: Ugh! I forgot. I have to get back to the village in time for my studies.

speaker: Friend
dialog: Oh, that is today, huh? Hm...the sun’s already starting to set though, I don’t think we’ll make it back on time.

speaker: Me
dialog: *sigh* Yes, it looks like you’re right. Well, we might as well start our journey back n-

speaker: Friend
dialog: Wait! I know a way that we’ll be able to get there in no time!

speaker: Me
dialog: Oh? But, it’ll take at least 30 minutes to go around the forest.

speaker: Friend
dialog: Exactly! Why don’t we just go through the forest?

speaker: Me
dialog: I...don’t know if that’s a good idea. Isn’t it dangerous?

speaker: Friend
dialog: Oh please, I’ve taken this shortcut a few times myself already. There’s nothing to worry about, just follow my lead!

speaker: Me
dialog: If you say so...ah, thank you, by the way.

speaker: Friend
dialog: No problem! Here, I’ll take all the picnic stuff and get a head start!

speaker: Friend
dialog: We gotta hurry, remember? I won’t go too far ahead so you can still see where I’m heading, just catch up with me!

speaker: Me
dialog: I...alright, fine. Goodness, I swear, she’s so infuriating at times.
